name: Space Jammed (Liéna EULOGE)
description:
Space Jammed is about a spaceship that avoids and destroys asteroids, trying to last as long as possible. If it gets hit, the module that has been hit gets destroyed, making the game harder while a warning window blocks a part of your screen. To repair the broken part, the player has to complete a QTE while still maneuvering in the asteroid field.

It as been made during the ISART DIGITAL & AMPLITUDE STUDIOS 2020 game jam, with Unity

Technology Notes: 

We used https://www.piskelapp.com to create all of our sprites, GIMP and Audacity.

Made by :

Bastien RAPPENECKER
Liéna EULOGE
Aubin VAN OLDEN BARNEVELD
Pierre PETILLAT
Alexis GABORIT

Using assets from :

  • opengameart.org (sounds)
  • freesound.org (sounds)
  • dafont.com (fonts)

All the other assets were done by our team.
